subject: Anti-Terrorist and Monetary Cr
body:
Anti-Terrorist and Monetary Crimes Division
FBI Headquarters, Washington, D.C.
Federal Bureau of Investigation
J.Edgar Hoover Building 935 Pennsylvania Avenue,
NW Washington, D.C.
Attention Fund Beneficiary!!!
This e-mail has been issued to you in order to officially inform you that we have completed an investigation on an International Payment in which was issued to you by an International Lottery Company. With the help of our newly developed technology (International Monitoring Network System, we discovered that your e- mail address was automatically selected by an Online Balloting System, this has legally won you the sum of $12.5million USD from a Lottery Company outside the United States of America. During our investigation, we discovered that your e- mail won the money from an Online Balloting System and we have authorized this winning to be paid to you ATM VISA CARD or CHECK.Or Bank Transfer
We have successfully notified this company on your behalf that funds are to be drawn from a registered bank within the world winded, to enable you receive your fund instantly without any delay, henceforth the stated amount of $12.5million USD has been deposited with IMF. We have completed this investigation and y
ou are hereby approved to receive the winning prize as we have verified the entire transaction to be Safe and 100% risk free, due to the fact that the funds have been deposited with IMF you will be required to contact the IMF Office in New York to settle the following bills directly to the IMF Office,
(1) Deposit Fee's (IMF INTERNATIONAL CLEARANCE CERTIFICATE)
(2) Shipping Fee's ( This is the charge for shipping the ATM VISA CARD to your home address)
(3) Bank Transfer is Also Our Next Option Of Transaction toenable us have this Transaction completed with you,
The total amount for everything is $285.00 
We have tried our possible best to indicate that this $285.00 should be deducted from your winning prize but we found out that the funds have already been deposited to IMF and cannot be accessed by anyone apart from you the winner, therefore you will be required to pay the required fee's to the IMF Office in-charge of this transaction In order to proceed with this transaction,you will be required to contact IMF director in-charge (MR. MALHAR NABAR)via e-mail. Kindly look below to find appropriate contact information:
CONTACT AGENT NAME: Kristalina Georgieva
E-mail address: 
departnote@gmail.com
You will be required to e-mail him with the following information:
1. Name in full.
2. Address.
3. Nationality.
4. Age.
5. Occupation.
6. Phone No: And WhatsappNo.
7. Present Country.
8. Fax [optional].
9. Email address.
You will also be required to request Western Union or Money Gram details on how to send the required $285.00
 in order to immediately ship your prize of $12.5 Million USD via ATM VISA CARD, CHECK, Or Bank Transfer from IMF. Make your option on how you want to receive your payment, also include the following 
transaction code in order for him to immediately identify this transaction: EA2948-910
. This letter will serve as proof that the Federal Bureau of Investigation is authorizing you to pay the required $285.00 ONLY to MR. MALHAR NABAR. via information, in, which he shall send to you, Yours in Service,
Regards.
MR. CHRISTOPHER A. WRAY
FEDERAL BUREAU OF INVESTIGATIONS (F.B.I)

subject: Re: Anti-Terrorist and Monetary Cr
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. I appreciate your efforts in notifying me about the payment that I have supposedly won from a lottery company. It's quite exciting to hear about such an opportunity.

I understand that you have completed an investigation and verified the safety of the funds, which have been deposited with the IMF. However, before proceeding further, I would like to gather some more information.

Could you please provide me with additional details about the lottery company? I'm curious to know which company it is and how they selected my email address for this online balloting system.

Also, could you explain why there are fees involved in receiving the prize? I want to make sure that everything is transparent and legitimate before proceeding any further.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Michael

subject: Re: Anti-Terrorist and Monetary Cr
body:
Address: 700 19th St NW, Washington, DC 20431, United States
Main organ: Board of Governors
Founded: July 1944, Bretton Woods, New Hampshire, United States
Managing Director: Kristalina Georgieva
Founders: John Maynard Keynes, Harry Dexter White
Staff: 2,400
Parent organization: United Nations
Subsidiaries: International Monetary Fund (Vietnam), MORE
Phone: +1 (304) 209 5651
Hours:
Closed ⋅ Opens 8:30 am
Abbreviation: IMF

Hello Michael

This Mr MALHAR NABAR The IMF Staff Incharge of Your Fund Transfer Valued
sum of $12.5 Million Us Dollars, Am Sorry For Late And Delay In Response,
But We Have to Take out Time To Make Further and Better Investigation
Regarding This Fund, This e-mail has been issued to you in order to
officially inform you that we have completed an investigation on an
International Payment  the sum of $12.5million USD from a Lottery Company
outside the United States of America.  to be paid to you ATM VISA CARD or
CHECK.Or Bank Transfer As According to The Request of Mr Christopher Wray
The Director of FBI,


The International Monetary Fund (IMF) is a major financial agency of the
United Nations, and an international financial institution funded by 190
member countries, with headquarters in Washington, D.C. It is regarded as
the global lender of last resort to national governments, and a leading
supporter of exchange-rate stability. Its stated mission is "working to
foster global monetary cooperation, secure financial stability, facilitate
international trade, promote high employment and sustainable economic
growth, and reduce poverty around the world." Established on December 27,
1945 at the Bretton Woods Conference, primarily according to the ideas of
Harry Dexter White and John Maynard Keynes, it started with 29 member
countries and the goal of reconstructing the international monetary system
after World War II. It now plays a central role in the management of
balance of payments difficulties and international financial crises.
Through a quota system, countries contribute funds to a pool from which
countries can borrow if they experience balance of payments problems. As of
2016, the fund had SDR 477 billion (about US$667 billion)

The IMF is mandated to oversee the international monetary and financial
system and monitor the economic and financial policies of its member
countries. This activity is known as surveillance and facilitates
international co-operation. Since the demise of the Bretton Woods system of
fixed exchange rates in the early 1970s, surveillance has evolved largely
by way of changes in procedures rather than through the adoption of new
obligations. The responsibilities changed from those of guardians to those
of overseers of members' policies In This Regard we was able to Establish A
Network to Provides Information Relate with Overdue Payments Of All Kind
Including PropertIES Recovery, In This Process we Was Able To Recover Sum
of $12.5 Million Belong to You But Only Your Email Address Noted On Contact
of The Beneficiary,



Below is the Reason For The Final and Only Payment That is Required to Be
Paid in This Transaction to enable us have this Fund Transferred to you
Immediately,

(1) Deposit Fees (IMF INTERNATIONAL CLEARANCE CERTIFICATE)
(2) Shipping Fees ( This is the charge for shipping the ATM VISA CARD to
your home address)
(3) Bank Transfer is Also Our Next Option Of Transaction to enable us have
this Transaction completed with you,

According to Our Confirmation with the FBI In the Process of Completing
This Transaction we Acknowledged that sum of $285 Dollars is the only and
last payment you have to pay in this transaction to enable us have this
Fund Transferred to you through ( ATM Card/Bank Transfer )

THANK YOU FROM MR. MALHAR NABAR
E-mail address: departnote@gmail.com

subject: Re: Anti-Terrorist and Monetary Cr
body:
Hello Mr. MALHAR NABAR,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. It's interesting to learn about the IMF and its role in global financial stability. Could you provide more details about how the process of transferring the fund works? I'm curious to understand the steps involved in receiving the ATM VISA CARD or Bank Transfer.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Michael

subject: Re: Anti-Terrorist and Monetary Cr
body:
Hello Micahel Your Emails Received and The Contents Are Noted,

Account to Your Questions About The Process and System of Our Atm Card
Operations,

I have to take out time get all the needed Information As Requested,

Our Atm Card Operates with Account LINK WITH the Atm Card, Through Our Bank
Security Service and This Security Service Only Allow Beneficiarys to
withdraw Sum of $50,000 Dollars Daily But You Can only $5000 Dollars in One
Atm Machine Location, Universially,

And You Can Also Make Transfers Of $100,000 Us Dollars Daily From Our
Master Card Atm, The Atm card Service will TAKE 4 to 5 days to get to your
Destination After the PAYMENT,

While Our Bank Transfer will Move the Fund Directly Into your Domestic Bank
Account with the Next 7 Hours After the Payment,

Thanks and Reamin Blessed

subject: Re: Anti-Terrorist and Monetary Cr
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing the information about the ATM card process and system. It's good to know how it operates with the bank security service and the daily withdrawal limits. Could you please provide more details about how one can make transfers using the Master Card ATM? Also, I'm curious about the payment process and how one can ensure a smooth transaction. Thank you for your time and assistance in clarifying these details.

Best wishes,
Michael
